data.quote: Ahimsa is the highest duty. Even if we cannot practice it fully, we should try to understand its spirit and stay away from violence
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: The good fighters of old first put themselves beyond the possibility of defeat, and then waited for an opportunity of defeating the enemy.
data.author: Sun Tzu

data.quote: You are what you believe in. You become that which you believe you can become
data.author: Srimad Bhagavad Gita

data.quote: Work for workâ€™s sake, not for yourself. Act but do not be attached to your actions. Be in the world, but not of it
data.author: Srimad Bhagavad Gita

data.quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
data.author: Albert Einstein
